name: BlueLimbo
description:
Hello, this game is made for Lumdum Dare 40.

You are a being in a world where death resides, the more alive you are the more death will seek you

to escape from the deaths you have to have hearts low, if you are at the top kill you instantly if you are not in a safe area, KEY [s] to self-harm, if you are in low hearts death will not seek you.

Join all the strings

Controls:

W: To Jump

A: Right

D:Left

S: Special
